data.actual_result: Mini menu crashes so you need to right click again
data.expected_result: You should keep getting allowed to add roles to the user without the mini menu crashing
data.short_description: Giving multiple roles closes role tab
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1 be on a server with admin priviliges - Step 2 create 20-30 + roles - Step 3 Right click a user - Step 4 mouse over roles and begin to checkmark all created roles - At one point the role menu will just close - etc
